TopicTitle: Backup photographer makes mockery of high Mun pass

Articles.Content:
Unfortunately, our primary flyby photographer, Bill, was out sick so we had to find someone else to document our high Mun pass. Killip, from the mail room, was the only one with any amateur experience. Killip thought it would be funny to document the flyby in his own unique way:

Steampunk Mun or SandPeople

"The Little Prince"

Needless to say, we can't wait for Bill to feel better so we can scientifically document our missions. Killip is grounded to the mail room again.
